data.title: artistes marital status :: jdorama.com
data.text:
enau wrote:

Hamasaki Ayumi (singer, acted too in drama Miseinen) --- married to --- Manuel Schwarz (Austrian actor)

Update Marital Status: FILE FOR DIVORCE

(IMO: Typical celebrity story. )

Hamasaki Ayumi to file for divorce

by ustar - January 16, 2012 at 1:45 pm

On January 16th, Hamasaki Ayumi announced through her official fan club site, �gTeam Ayu�g, that she is divorcing her husband Manuel Schwarz.

Ayu wrote, �gI am reporting that I will be filing for divorce on Monday in America,�h and explained the reason for divorce. �gThe reason lies within myself. At the time of our marriage, we decided to live in America, however, because of the Tohoku Earthquake that occurred two months later, a strong feeling sprouted within me that I didn�ft want to be apart from Japan. I wasn�ft able to imagine a life in America, and as a result, I left my husband by himself for a long period of time.�h

The two met back in August of 2010 during a shoot for �gVirgin Road�g, when Manuel starred in the PV as Ayu�fs husband. Then on January 1st of 2011, the couple tied the knot at a small chapel in Las Vegas.

On January 4th, when Ayu landed in Hawaii for work, reporters called out, �gCongratulations on your one year anniversary.�h With a smile, Ayu replied, �gThank you. I�fve received many messages from my fans.�h She also commented, �gAfter my stay in Hawaii for work, I will go to another place in 2 or 3 days.�h Sources say that Ayu returned to Los Angeles after this trip to discuss the divorce proceedings with her husband.

Source: Tokyohive, Daily Sports and Oricon

_________________

Why torture yourself when life will do it for you.

(Taken from "Stepkids")

Divorce news for this couple.

19 years together and .....

I surely didn't see it coming.

Takuma Shin & Kaku Chikako divorce after 19 years

by ustar on February 11, 2012 at 4:35 pm

It�fs been reported that actor Takuma Shin (55) and actress Kaku Chikako (50) has filed for divorce.

According to sources, Takuma and Kaku had already been living separately for quite some time before the divorce. The divorce papers were submitted on February 10th by a person closely affiliated with the couple.

The two sent a letter to the media explaining, �gBefore we knew it, we grew distant. We weren�ft able to fill in that gap.�h They continued, �gThe two of us thoroughly talked things over, and as a result, we decided to get a divorce. From here on, we both plan to continue to work hard.�h

Takuma and Kaku started dating after starring in the 1992 drama, �gShichinin no Onna Bengoshi�g. They held their wedding ceremony in New Zealand in January of 1994, then held a reception at a hotel in Tokyo.

Although the couple had no children, there were no reports that they were on bad terms with each other. People close to the two say, �gWe had no idea. We don�ft really know the reasons either.�h

In November of 2010, Takuma and Kaku appeared together at the �gHusband and Wife Platinum Awards�g. At this event, Kaku praised Takuma saying, �gI�fm able to rely on him, he�fs very manly.�h In response, Takuma said, �gAnyway, there are no cloudy days,�h showing that they had a good relationship.

Source & Image: Tokyohive & Daily Sports

enau wrote:

Kaku Chikako (GOLD) --- married to --- Takuma Shin (Yuusha Yoshihiko to Maou no Shiro, Kōmyō ga Tsuji, Delicious Relation)

_________________

Why torture yourself when life will do it for you.

(Taken from "Stepkids")

Last edited by enau on Thu Sep 06, 2012 1:03 pm; edited 1 time in total

Oguri Shun, Yamada Yu to marry on March 14

March 12, 2012

Actor Oguri Shun and actress Yamada Yu announced in a fax to the media that they will get married on Wednesday, March 14, which happens to be White Day in Japan. The two have been dating since March 14 in 2008, so their wedding date will mark their 4th anniversary as a couple.

In their announcement, the two thanked the many people who have supported them up until now. �gWe are truly very grateful,�h they said. �gFrom now on, we will continue supporting each other and cherishing each day, and we hope to build a warm home.�h

Sources say that the two were originally planning to get married on July 5 of last year (Yamada�fs 27th birthday), but they decided to postpone it due to the effects of the Tohoku earthquake and tsunami.

Source:

Sponichi Annex

DREAMS COME TRUE�fs Yoshida Miwa marries FUZZY CONTROL�fs JUON

March 20, 2012

DREAMS COME TRUE vocalist Yoshida Miwa recently got married to FUZZY CONTROL vocalist/guitarist JUON, it has been learned. The couple registered their marriage on March 8th, which happens to be JUON�fs birthday (and can even be read as �gmi-wa�h).

In 2009, DREAMS COME TRUE released the single �gGOOD BYE MY SCHOOL DAYS,�h which included a version of the title song by the band FUZZY CONTROL. The band also participated on DREAMS COME TRUE�fs next single �gSono Saki e,�h released later that same year. The two groups have also toured together, deepening Yoshida and JUON�fs relationship. Since 2010, FUZZY CONTROL has been managed by DREAMS COME TRUE�fs agency, DCT entertainment.

Yoshida was previously in a common-law marriage with music video director Sueda Ken, but he died of a tumor in 2007 at the age of 33.

There are currently no plans for a wedding ceremony or party. Both Yoshida and JUON plan to continue with their music careers.

Source:

Sports Hochi

and one more:

Emoto Tasuku, Ando Sakura marry

Actor Emoto Tasuku and actress Ando Sakura got married on March 14 (White Day), it has been learned. Their respective management agencies announced the news on Friday.

Both Emoto and Ando are children of well-known celebrities. Emoto is the son of actor Emoto Akira and actress Tsunogae Kazue, while Ando is the daughter of actor Okuda Eiji and essayist Ando Kazu.

According to their agencies, the two first met 4 years ago at the Akita Jumonji Cinema Festival, and they dated for about 3 years before getting married. They both appeared in the movie �gKenta to Jun to Kayo-chan no Kuni�h in 2010. After that movie�fs release, there were reports that the two were dating, and at the time they openly confirmed their relationship.

Sources:

Sponichi Annex

Sankei Sports

Inoue Waka to marry director Iizuka Ken

April 22, 2012

According to the Sankei Sports newspaper, talento Inoue Waka is getting married on her next birthday, May 13th. Her husband will be 33-year-old movie director Iizuka Ken (�gSAI-REN,�h �gSummer Nude�h), who recently worked on the live-action television and movie adaptations of �gArakawa Under the Bridge.�h

The two first met in March of last year during the filming of �gArakawa Under the Bridge.�h Their relationship was said to be purely professional at the time, but they met again during a group meal in May after filming was completed and started dating soon after that.

Iizuka also cast Inoue in his stage play �gFUNNY BUNNY,�h which is currently running until the end of this month.

The Sankei Sports newspaper says that Inoue�fs agency has confirmed that she is getting married. It is said that she plans on continuing with her show business career.

Source:

Sankei Sports

enau wrote:

Okouchi Nanako (Utahime, Botan to Bara) --- married to --- Takuma Takayuki (Celeb & Poor, Shinsengumi Keppuroku)

Marital Status Update:

DIVORCE

Takuma Takayuki and Okouchi Nanako file for divorce

by Shiso on May 11, 2012 at 9:56 am

Scenario writer and actor Takuma Takayuki (41) and actress Okouchi Nanako (34) announced via FAX that they have filed for divorce on May 7th.

According to Takuma, the reason for their divorce is that their �gpoints of view for the future and sense of value diverge from each other. Therefore, we�fve concluded that going our separate ways would be the best choice for each others�f future. We do not hate each other, nor do we feel depressed.�h

They got married back in November 2006, and had a son in September 2008. Though Okouchi has custody of the child, Takuma will also be involved in raising the child. Okouchi commented, �gIt�fs the start of my new life. I would like to go on cheerfully and happily with �eTora-san�f (their son). We will always be a father and mother for �eTora-san�f.�h

Source & Image: Oricon style, Tokyohive

_________________

Why torture yourself when life will do it for you.

(Taken from "Stepkids")

Last edited by enau on Wed Sep 05, 2012 6:00 pm; edited 1 time in total

enau wrote:

Kubozuka Yosuke (GTO, Strawberry on the shortcake, Long Love Letter) --- married to --- Non-chan (she's a dancer)

Close up Faces:

Kubozuka Yosuke & Non-chan

Marital Status Update:

DIVORCE

Kubozuka Yosuke announces divorce from his wife

by ustar on July 12, 2012

On July 12th, actor Kubozuka Yosuke (34) announced through his official website that he had divorced his wife a month ago.

He reported, �gIt was about 9 years of married life, but after talking things through with my wife, we decided to �ethink about our child first�f. It means that this is the best path for the 3 of us. Such a way of speaking is strange, but it�fs a peaceful divorce.�h

Regarding the divorce Kubozuka explained, �gSince we lived apart for refuge after March 11 (of 2011), our circumstances didn�ft change at all. We just decided to cut the ties as husband and wife.�h

He commented, �gFor my wife, I intend to continue supporting her including her dance school,�h and continued, �gOn paper, I have parental authority over our son. But a child has 2 parents, a father and mother. That attitude won�ft change, as we will devote ourselves together.�h

Kubozuka married a non-celebrity woman back in May of 2003, and the couple welcomed their first son in October of the same year.

Source & Image: Oricon, Tokyohive

_________________

Why torture yourself when life will do it for you.

(Taken from "Stepkids")

"Reception to follow in 7 months"

Shun Oguri and Yamada Yu hold reception on Okinawa

Actor Oguri Shun and actress Yamada Yu – who married on March 14 this year – have finally found the time to hold their wedding reception at a resort hotel in Yamada�fs hometown in Okinawa on October 2.

According to the magazine, the wedding reception was attended in great numbers by their mutual relatives, including Yamada�fs mother, model Yamada Mikako, as well as her younger brother, actor Yamada Shintaro.

It�fs said that Yamada wanted to hold the ceremony in her hometown because she didn�ft want to burden her grandparents who live in Okinawa. Her mother organized the event for both families.

Source: Sanspo

I guess they wanted to see if it would last.

Tsutsumi Shinichi announces marriage

On March 1, actor Tsutsumi Shinichi announced through his agency�f official site that he has married a 32-year-old non-celebrity woman.

Below is the comment from Tsutsumi.

===

Announcement of marriage

I, Tsutsumi Shinichi, have registered my marriage today on March 1st.

We met each other about 4 years ago. We took our time and waited for the right moment, and now, registered our marriage.

Since both herself and her family are ordinary people, I would like to refrain from revealing details, such as her name or photo.

Also, since this is a private matter, I ask for your kind understanding that I will not hold any press conference.

Currently, I�fm practicing for the upcoming stage play �eIma Hitotabi no Shura�f that will open in April 5th. As I got a new surrounding of �efamily�f, I will increases the powers of concentration more than before, and strive for work.

I will greatly appreciate your further guidance and encouragement.

March 1, 2013

Tsutsumi Shinichi

=====

Source: MSN Japan
